activities: Slash7 is a privately held company that offers web-based, subscription software for time tracking and invoicing. When users registers an account, we ask for names, email and credit card information in order to provide the subscription-based service. We don't ask for credit card information for our free plans. Slash7 uses collected information for the following general purposes: products and services provision, billing, identification and authentication, services improvement, contact, and research. We don't share information with 3rd parties, except when required to provision and improve the service.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: all client and customer personal data, manually processed and electronic
